content: {"name": "CAC Dunwoody Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Serves Only Dunwoody Residents**\nThey have 2 locations in  Sandy Springs \"Serves Sandy Springs, GA residents\" Check website for locations\nThe following items are necessary to facilitate the application process: Identification (for everyone in the household). Social Security numbers (for everyone in the household). Utility bills (gas, electric, oil, water and telephone). Rent receipt/agreement, mortgage statement and/or tax bill. Proof of income (for everyone in the household). Medical expenses (if 60 or older and/or disabled). Children's daycare expenses. (770) 552-4015 ext. 701", "email": "", "url": "https://ourcac.org/services-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5 Dunwoody Park South", "address_2": null, "city": "Dunwoody", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30338", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.9229674, "longitude": -84.3101289}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 552-4015", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}]}
